subject: Doping (Sports)
Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
Veterinary Medicine
Animal Abuse, Rights and Welfare
organizations: People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals
lead_paragraph: Lasix, a diuretic that reduces bleeding in horses’ respiratory systems, is at the center of a struggle pitting owners and breeders against trainers and veterinarians.
snippet: Lasix, a diuretic that reduces bleeding in horses’ respiratory systems, is at the center of a struggle pitting owners and breeders against trainers and veterinarians.
